description: This table contains transaction information for reference labs. Only transactions for reference labs are in this table, and only transactions with type set as charge (column TRAN_TYPE in table CLARITY_TDL_TRAN). These are based on the service area of the transaction which will have the billing system set to reference lab billing (column BILLING_SYSTEM_C in table CLARITY_SA).

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the transaction.

columns.name: TEST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the test for this transaction.

columns.name: LAB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the lab for this transaction.

columns.name: RL_RQG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the requisition grouper for this transaction.

columns.name: RL_SUBMITTER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the submitter for this transaction.

columns.name: RL_SUBMITTER_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: RL_REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Requisition for this transaction.

columns.name: RL_SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the specimen for this transaction.

columns.name: RL_SPECIMEN_LINE
columns.description: The specimen line of the specimen this transaction belongs to.
